resources.string:
If you are having trouble receiving Cadpage alerts on a Samsung device, see http://www.cadpage.org/faq/cadpage-2-0
 Updated 03/16/2019

 v2.1.4-03
 Modified to target Android 9. For most users, upgrading to this release will be uneventful. For reasons that remain mysterious, a handful of users will discover that regular Cadpage notifications now require permission to access user data. Cadpage will attempt to identify these users and request user data permission when this update is installed in hopes of preventing it from failing when a real alarm is processed.
 
 Location Fixes:
 Deschutes County, OR
